__e: You remembered me...and here I am!
No experience, sir, but i'm glad you thought of me.
I did about what happened to you, but did you think of me too?
You have got it worked out pretty good.
You.... You thought it all out, haven't you?
I told you she has everything.
I did about what happened to you, but did you think of me too?
You had nothing else to do, so you thought you'd come around and see me.
She was not like you that never thought of us.
I never thought I'd hear myself saying that, but I said it.
Thought I couldn't even get up to bed without you, huh?
Do you know my dear, she thought that you were .. I mean that I was .. oh you know what I mean ..
And that's why... he thought I'm him.
THAT'S WHO YOU THOUGHT WAS OVER AT THE DOOR, DIDN'T YOU ?
Well, for not being what you took me for.
Thought I couldn't even get up to bed without you, huh?
Do you know my dear, she thought that you were .. I mean that I was .. oh you know what I mean ..
Well, it's just that my mother thought that if you've got nothing to do, you'd like to come back and have supper with us.
Have you ever thought about what I feel going to meet this man?
HAVE YOU THOUGHT ABOUT WHAT YOU'RE GONNA DO?
Have you thought what could happen to us then?
And have you thought it over
You thought about it long enough.
WHY, NOBODY AROUND HERE HAS EVER THOUGHT ABOUT IT.
Have you thought what could happen to us then?
WHY, NOBODY AROUND HERE HAS EVER THOUGHT ABOUT IT.
HAVE YOU THOUGHT ABOUT WHAT YOU'RE GONNA DO?
Have you considered what that will lead to?
Already thought about what it will take and what will leave him?
Have you considered what might happen if that girl found out whose side you're really on?
Have you considered what might happen if that girl found out whose side you're really on?
Already thought about what it will take and what will leave him?
You're always against her, but do you think of all the good she's done for me?
Why do you stare like that? Have you never thought it before?
I was sure somebody must've thought of it before I did.
Why didn't he think of that before?
She says she has thought it through and there is no changing her mind.
Why didn't you think of that two years ago?
He thought of it, but I'm the one who did it.
- His only thought was of my safety.
Had you planned on getting home?
